plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera for dashcam recording.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your microphone for dashcam audio recording.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location for navigation and dashcam tracking.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location in the background for dashcam tracking.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location for navigation.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photo library to save dashcam recordings.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to save dashcam recordings to your photo library.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photo library so you can select photos for hazard reports or your profile.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your camera to take photos for hazard reports or your profile.
